title: City Of Rocks National Reserve: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger          Our Junior Ranger Program is designed to help you and your family enjoy the reserve, as well as help the rangers protect its features. Being a Junior Ranger means more than just knowing about the nature and history of the area. Junior Rangers must help protect the area by obeying the rules and caring for the wildlife and special features of City of Rocks.   Junior Ranger Pledge:    Enjoy nature without picking plants or injuring wildlife    Help keep our reserve clean and free of litter    Only climb where you can safely climb down    Be a positive example for other park visitors    Explore the wonders of City of Rocks    Invite others to visit City of Rocks National Reserve   Junior Ranger Activity Guide Become a WebRanger
